loopフィールドの多階層処理のテスト用モジュール

    {&{"loop":{"name":"sample_loop1","min":3,"max":10}}&}
  • loop1: {&{"input":{"type":"markdown","name":"md_src1"}}&}
      {&{"loop":{"name":"sample_loop2","min":3,"max":10}}&}
    • loop2: {&{"input":{"type":"markdown","name":"md_src2"}}&}
        {&{"loop":{"name":"sample_loop3","min":3,"max":10}}&}
      • loop3:
        {&{"input":{"type":"markdown","name":"md_src3"}}&}
        {&{"input":{"type":"multitext","name":"multitext_src3"}}&}
        • {&"endloop"&}
      • {&"endloop"&}
    • {&"endloop"&}

/loopフィールドの多階層処理のテスト用モジュール
